query:
SELECT 
  'crm_clients' as table_name, COUNT(*) as column_count 
FROM information_schema.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'crm_clients'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'leads', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'leads'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'contacts', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'contacts'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'client_tasks', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'client_tasks'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'design_tasks', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'design_tasks'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'website_projects', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'website_projects'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'billing_charges', COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'billing_charges';
